title: Login Music -- Who sings it?
body: Does anybody know who sings this song?? It is AWESOME! {{champion:498}} {{champion:497}}

replies.body:
Hey AnnieDepressant,

I am the composer for the piece. The singer on this is Úyanga Bold! She's pretty incredible indeed :)

Thanks for listening!

Cheers,
Ed the Conqueror

> [{quoted}](name=Ed the Conqueror,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=HvurrfEX,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2017-04-21T03:52:06.153+0000)
>
> Hey AnnieDepressant,
> 
> I am the composer for the piece. The singer on this is Úyanga Bold! She's pretty incredible indeed :)
> 
> Thanks for listening!
> 
> Cheers,
> Ed the Conqueror

Who also did the vocals for Masters of War.

> [{quoted}](name=DragonShea,realm=EUW,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=HvurrfEX,comment-id=00010000,timestamp=2017-04-21T11:53:00.268+0000)
>
> Who also did the vocals for Masters of War.

... and the wordless vocals on Star Guardian's "Burning Bright"!

> [{quoted}](name=Ed the Conqueror,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=HvurrfEX,comment-id=000100000000,timestamp=2017-04-21T15:22:42.022+0000)
>
> ... and the wordless vocals on Star Guardian's "Burning Bright"!

True that. You guys make good music. Need more of it in game Though.  {{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}

Her voice is so good. You got the right person to do it, it sounds perfect.
Thanks for the correction! Keep it coming!
